text: Horácio Delfim Dias de Faria (born 2 December 1947) is a former Portuguese football player. He played 14 seasons and 313 games in the Primeira Liga for Leixões and Varzim. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Leixões on 18 September 1966 in a game against Sanjoanense. On 14 December 1969, he scored 5 goals for Leixões against Boavista. ==References== ==External links== Category:1947 births Category:People from Matosinhos Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Leixões S.C. players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Varzim S.C. players Category:S.C. title: Horácio de Faria
